About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Thurs by appointment; closed Fri, public holidays and Christmas - New Year period. General reference assistance available. Copying services for books, journals and photographs can be arranged.

About.Access: The Archive Office is located in the library. Please put reference requests in writing, mentioning the subject and purpose of the research.

About.Acquisition focus: Records pertaining to the College, its students, staff and officers.

About.Major holdings: Publications of the College: The Scotsman 1914- (annual; 1m); The Lion and Lang Syne (quarterly); Flying Scotman (weekly). Photographs 1893- (10m). Minutes 1915- (3m). Student files 1955- . (30m; closed).
